mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMELINE VALUES('TI'|| TO_CHAR(SEQ_TIME.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'), #{content}, #{memberNo}, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{aStatus})
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES('AT'|| TO_CHAR(SEQ_AT_NO.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'), 'TI'|| TO_CHAR(SEQ_TIME.CURRVAL, 'FM000'), #{originName}, #{changeName} , #{filePath}, #{ext})
